name: Adastrea
description: An open-world space flight game built on Unreal Engine 5.6. Players can explore vast galaxies, engage in thrilling space battles, discover new planets, manage space stations, build crew relationships, and participate in a dynamic galactic economy. The project features 22 major game systems with over 33,000 lines of C++ code and comprehensive Blueprint integration.
features: Dynamic combat system with 6 weapon types
Faction system with diplomacy and reputation
Way System - Specialized guilds and micro-alliances
AI system for faction and personnel behaviors
Complete UI systems (HUD, inventory, trading, etc.)

technical_details.architecture: 22 major game systems, modular C++ architecture
technical_details.editor_friendly: Blueprint-first design, minimal C++ knowledge required
technical_details.testing: Comprehensive automated testing with smoke tests and screenshot tests
technical_details.python_automation: Extensive Python scripts for scene population and content generation

custom_fields.documentation: Comprehensive guides in Assets/ and wiki/
custom_fields.reality_check: C++ systems implemented, editor content (Blueprints, Data Assets, Maps, UI) needs creation
custom_fields.yaml_templates: Ready-to-use templates for all major systems in Assets/
custom_fields.build_tools: GitHub Actions CI/CD, Docker support for cloud builds
